Title: The Counselor
Actors: Michael Fassbender, Penélope Cruz, Cameron Diaz, Javier Bardem
Plot: A rich and successful lawyer, the Counselor, is about to get married to his fiancée but soon becomes entangled in a complex drug plot with a middle-man known as Westray. The plan ends up taking a horrible twist and he must protect himself and his soon to be bride as the truth of the drug business is uncovered and targets are eliminated.
Production: Scott Free Productions, Chockstone Pictures, Nick Wechsler
